flow.description: Минимальный флоу для работы связки kafka minio
flow.name: kafka->minio minimal flow

source.name: ExecuteGroovyScript
ExecuteGroovyScript

destination.name: ExecuteGroovyScript

properties.avroFromEshop:
{
  "type": "record",
  "name": "TestObject",
  "namespace": "Product",
  "fields": [
    { "name": "Product_id", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "Name", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "Description", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "Category", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "Manufacturer", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "SKU", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "productNumber", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "Quantity", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "Unit_price", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null }
  ]
}

Max Length To Put In Attribute.displayName: Max Length To Put In Attribute
Max Length To Put In Attribute.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

properties.sql-pre-query:
INSERT INTO processes (
    PROCESS_GROUP,
    ObjectId,
    ObjectName,
    EventType,
    Status,
    Error,
    SourceJson,
    TargetJson
) VALUES (
    ${filename:or('unknown')},
    ${objectId:toNumber()},
    'Product',
    'export catalog',
    'ok',
    NULL,
    ?::jsonb,
    NULL
)

processors.name: ExecuteGroovyScript
